DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether ingestion bar contain either add soy protein soy fiber , increase subjective objective measure satiety compare control bar .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Soy Protein/Soy Fiber Measures Satiety
DOC.detailed_description: The study use randomize , double blind crossover design subject act control . Satiation assess use Motivation Eat Questionnaire . Height weight measure screen visit weight alone subsequent visit . Prior consumption test meal ( breakfast ) 15 , 30 , 60 , 90 , 120 150 min thereafter , subject complete VAS Motivation Eat Questionnaire . After subject complete first VAS motivation questionnaire , give test meal instruct eat 15 minute period fill palatability questionnaire . Two hour start test meal take private feeding room , ad libitum pizza lunch serve mineral water . Participants instruct eat drink much desire comfortably full . Subjects ask fill final VAS Motivation eat questionnaire 30 min start pizza meal .
DOC.criteria: BMI 20 30 kg/m2 Age 2060y Unrestrained eater ( score < 15 ) Regularly consume 3 meal per day Moderate exercise ( eg running , aerobics class , sport activity ) 7 hour per week use drug influence carbohydrate lipid metabolism ( eg betablockers , hypoglycemic agent , antibiotic take less 6 week study entry , glucocorticoid , antidiarrheal medication , weight loss medication etc ) , antidiabetic medication presence significant disease ( eg gastrointestinal disease , diabetes , CVD event le 12 week study entry , current hepatic disease etc ) use special dietary treatment supplement within 4 week study restrain eater ( score > 15 ) weight change ( Â±10 % body weight ) within previous 6 week alcohol intake > 2 drinks/day food allergy kind swallow difficulty , exercise 7 hour per week
